name: Introduction to Rhetoric
description: This course provides an introduction to the study of rhetoric and its role in communication, discourse, and culture.

name: Rhetoric of Public Address
description: This course focuses on the study of rhetoric in public address, from the ancient Greeks to modern day speakers.

name: Rhetorical Analysis
description: This course covers the fundamentals of rhetorical analysis and strategies for discourse analysis.

name: Rhetorical Criticism
description: This course focuses on the various techniques of rhetorical criticism, including the use of historical, ideological, and psychological approaches to rhetorical discourse.

name: Advanced Rhetorical Theory
description: This course examines advanced topics in rhetorical theory, from classical oration to modern public discourse.
